body_html:
@Carmezim Okay, so I've downloaded cuDNN 5.1 (Version 8.0), and unzipped. There seems to be no exe file, so I just put the folder somewhere and created a path to the cudnn64_5.dll file located within the folder.

C:\Nvidia_CUDL\cuda\bin\cudnn64_5.dll (This is the path I've created in the path variable)
Is the file I'm supposed to create a path to?
However, I still seem to be presented with the error.

Thank you.

body:
@Carmezim  Okay, so I've downloaded cuDNN 5.1 (Version 8.0), and unzipped. There seems to be no exe file, so I just put the folder somewhere and created a path to the `cudnn64_5.dll`  file located within the folder. 

 `C:\Nvidia_CUDL\cuda\bin\cudnn64_5.dll`    (This is the path I've created in the path variable)
Is the file I'm supposed to create a path to?
However,  I still seem to be presented with the error. 

Thank you.
